author: Ainsley Harriott
method: To make the chocolate sauce, mix all the ingredients in a saucepan and warm through to create a smooth sauce. Take a large glass and place some ice cream into it.  Drizzle the chocolate sauce, repeat the process till the glass is full, sprinkle with toasted nuts and serve
ingredients: 3 tbsp double cream,  2 tbsp cocoa powder,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  1 tbsp honey,  3 scoops ice cream,  35g/1Â½oz hazelnuts, toasted
